Title: Elf
Actors: Will Ferrell, James Caan, Bob Newhart, Edward Asner
Plot: Buddy, a human, is raised amongst elves at the North Pole. When he discovers that he is not an elf, he travels to New York to search for his biological father.
Production: Guy Walks into a Bar Productions, Gold/Miller Productions, Shawn Danielle Production Services, Mosaic Media Group
